description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may abuse Visual Basic (VB) for execution. Analytic 1 - Look for unusual VB execution. sourcetype=wineventlog OR sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=macos_secure | search (command="cscript.exe" OR command="wscript.exe" OR command=".vbs" OR command=".vba" OR command=".vbe") | eval suspicious_cmd=if(like(command_line, "%.vbs" OR "%.vba" OR "%.vbe"), "Yes", "No") | where suspicious_cmd="Yes"
